articles.description: After more than half a century in airplane seatback pockets, the American Airlines in-flight magazine is going away.
articles.content:

articles.author: Thomas Beaumont
articles.title: GOP ramps up misleading attack on Democrats' policing policy - Associated Press
articles.description: DES MOINES, Iowa (AP) — When Minnesota Republican Tyler Kistner announced his candidacy for the U.S. House in April, he asked voters to ponder two questions: “What America will we leave for our children?" and "Will they be taught to hate their police?”
